videos.word: What time do you wake up in the morning?
I wake up at 6:30 a.m., and my sister wakes up at 7:00 a.m.
What do you do to get ready in the morning?
I get dressed, brush my teeth, put on makeup, and do my hair.
I pack my backpack with books, pens, notebooks, and my homework.
How many classes do you have?
I have 5 classes: algebra, history, biology, English, and health.
My favorite teacher is my literature teacher.
My 3 favorite classes are art, biology, and P.E.
I have 2 brothers: Robbie and Kyle.
Robbie is 17 years old, and Kyle is 12 years old.
My 3 favorite teachers are my gym teacher, my health teacher, and my algebra teacher.
I have 2 sisters: Greta and Cici.
Greta's favorite class is literature, and Cici's is chemistry.
I have 4 classes: nursing, graphic arts, cooking, and welding.
I don't like cooking, but I love welding.
I am in the school chess and photography clubs.
Do you have social media accounts?
Yes, but I prefer socializing with my friends.
Adrean Clark is talented at drawing, but I am not.
I am a cashier at the grocery store.
I have to work all week.
I volunteer at the soup kitchen every Monday and every Wednesday.
My best friend volunteers on the weekends at the dorms at the Deaf Residential School.
What do you do before bed?
I wash my hair and my face, and I brush my teeth.
What time do you go to bed?
I go to bed at 10:00 p.m.
What is in your dad's office in your house?
My dad's office has a desk, a computer, a chair and a lamp.
What does your bedroom look like?
My bedroom has a big closet and a bed with white sheets and pillows.
What is in your living room?
There are two couches, a rug and a tv.
How many rooms are in your apartment?
There are 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms in my apartment.
The coffee table is in front of the couch.
The pictures are on the wall behind the couch.
There is a floor lamp in between the couch and loveseat.
The microwave is above the oven.
There are cabinets and shelves to the left of the microwave.
The toaster is on top of the counter.
The shower is adjacent the toilet.
A mirror is to the right of the sink.
Below the countertop is the washing machine.
There is a couch sitting on the porch.
My apartment has a porch and a balcony.
There are flowers, plants, and a swing in my front yard.
My house has a red metal door and a white wooden fence.
My house has a long winding driveway and a small semi-circular patio.
On Saturdays, I have to mop the floors and sweep the porch.
Every day, my mom washes the dishes and my dad takes out the garbage.
My brothers have to set the table and my sisters have to cook every night.
What chores do you help with in your home?
I stacked 3 blocks on top of each other.
I built a pyramid with my blocks.
The park has a slide next to the seesaw.
Last week, I went to the park and played hopscotch.
In my room, I have my toy cars, stuffed animals, and dolls lined up against the wall.
I was born in Tampa, Florida.
When you were growing up, what games did you used to play, and what was your favorite toy?
When I was growing up, I used to play hide and seek and tag.
My favorite toys were toy cars, action figures, and blocks.
My cousins are my aunt and uncle's children.
My stepfather is my mother's husband.
My nephews are my brother's twin sons.
How many grandchildren do your parents have?
My mom is pretty and artistic and my dad is tall and handsome.
My pet is old and fat, but friendly.
My twin cousins are pretty, athletic, and smart.
I am young, artistic, and funny.
Can you come to my sister and her fiance's wedding?
Yes, I can come to the wedding; I'm not doing anything.
I can possibly come to the wedding; that's my daughter's birthday.
The bride and groom invited 200 guests.
I'm sorry I can't come; I am busy.
We went to your aunt's funeral.
We are having a surprise party on Friday to celebrate my parents' anniversary.
Who is that woman in the red dress?
This is my great-grandmother from Canada.
Who are those men with the grey hair?
These are my uncles from Texas.
Which activities do you prefer to do in the summer?
I prefer swimming, surfing, and skating in the summer.
How do you and your friends stay fit?
We go running and exercise a lot.
Do you prefer Karate or boxing?
What do you do to stay healthy?
I eat healthy food, practice yoga, and sleep at least 8 hours every night.
My sister practices meditation, drinks a lot of water, and laughs a lot.
My family doesn't smoke, drink alcohol, or use drugs.
It's unhealthy to feel sad or bad every day.
My niece is profoundly deaf and had an audiology appointment yesterday.
She and my aunt decided not to use a cochlear implant or hearing aid.
I broke my foot today, and now it hurts.
My doctor said I shouldn't run or practice yoga for a week.
My sister hurt her back and neck horseback riding.
Eat healthy portions of each of the food groups for a balanced diet.
How many calories do I need for my height and weight?
How tall are you and how much do you weigh?
She is 5 feet 10 inches tall and weighs 160 pounds.
Excuse me, do you have vegetarian and gluten-free meals?
Please bring me a hamburger without cheese because I am allergic to dairy.
I prefer to eat healthy so I want to order the spicy fish tacos with rice.
My best friend eats unhealthy foods like french fries with salt and ketchup.
City Hall is across the street from the school.
The coffee shop is behind the gas station.
The grocery store is beside City Hall.
The bank is across the street from the school.
The gas station is in front of the coffee shop.
City Hall is beside the grocery store.
The school is adjacent the gas station.
My city has a courthouse, a police station, a fire station, and city Hall downtown.
I am going to the bookstore and the bank after I go to the hair salon.
There is a coffee shop inside the gas station near my house.
My favorite activities to do on the weekend are going to the mall, the movie theater, and the café with my friends.
In the morning, I take the subway to my job, and in the afternoon, I ride the bus home.
The bakery is on the corner across from the train station and the post office.
My brother prefers to drive a motorcycle to school.
Vocab 3 Grocery Store and Gas Station Directions
My community has a recycling and environmental awareness program.
Every weekend, I help clean up litter in the parks and beaches.
My family has a natural disaster plan for hurricanes, earthquakes, and tornados.
I am excited about going to the Deaf Awareness Charity Event at City Hall.
My grandparents live in Northern Florida and have orchards with grapes, grapefruit, oranges, and limes.
My uncle is a farmer and has vegetable fields in Texas and peach and nut orchards in Georgia.
I love to visit my family's strawberry farm in February and go to the country fair.
At summer camp, we ride horses, go fishing in the pond, look at the stars, and tell stories around the bonfire at night.
When I was little, I lived in the country and loved to enjoy the fresh air and go hiking in the woods.
I will call the travel agent next week to make my reservations for my summer vacation.
My family and I will book a round trip flight to Florida and then take a Deaf cruise with ports in the Caribbean.
My cousin and I are planning a vacation to Italy and will stay in an all-inclusive resort on the beach.
I will travel to France over the winter vacation and visit one of the first Deaf schools and all the museums.
We will book our reservations with a credit card but pay for food and other things in cash.
When we arrive at our destination, we will rent a car with GPS.
You will check in at reception in your hotel and then do some local sightseeing.
This fall, I want to go to a Deaf-friendly amusement park in Florida to ride the roller coasters and watch the shows.
Have you ever gone on the helicopter tours in Hawaii, or scuba diving and surfing in the ocean?
A 1-hour helicopter tour costs $200 and a scuba diving trip costs $185.
In the mountains of Colorado, you can go skiing or hiking with a tour guide.
What are you going to pack in your suitcase for your Deaf Cruise to Mexico this spring vacation?
I am going to take my bathing suit, sunscreen, sandals, and a hat.
I need to take my raincoat, umbrella, boots and my sunglasses for my guided tour to Ireland this summer because it is sunny, but it rains, too.
For my trip over Christmas vacation to France, I need my scarf and my winter coat because it is cold and snows in December.
I want to bring my camera to take pictures for my friends at all the Deaf-Friendly parks I go to on vacation.
What are your plans for after high school graduation?
I am going to work part-time in our family business and go to vocational school full-time.
I want to go to Gallaudet University, but I need to fill out my application and apply for financial aid and scholarships.
I want to major in ASL education so I can be a teacher.
I want to study abroad in the UK at the Doncaster College and get an internship.
What do you want to be in the future?
I want to be a famous actor and activist like Daniel Durant.
My best friend wants to be an inventor and a nutritionist so she is going to Tsukuba University of Technology in Japan.
My brother wants to be a rapper and musician like Chance the Rapper.
My cousin and I want to be professional athletes like Brandon White and Derrick Coleman.
My sister wants to be an actor and a model like Sean Berdy.
Alejandra has many brothers and sisters, 15.
Do you know my friend Jasmine?
From home, turn right on main street cross river and turn left on 5th street.
Take Broadway across the river and turn right on the first street.
Hey, I have a question for you.
I don't know the three boys standing behind me.
I have one brother and six sisters.
I have two sisters and four brothers.
Is your name father's name Christian?
No, I'm not deaf. I'm hearing.
She needs you to sign slow.
The tall boy with black hair is happy.
Those four girls are best friends.
We are going to class together.
What are those boys' names again?
Why are you learning sign language?
Yes, I am learning to sign.
Can you open the windows tonight?
Do you know the people in your neighborhood?
Can you turn on the garage light?
Do you think this class is hard or easy?
Fernandes' school is close to her house.
Hey, call me on my video phone.
I'll call you. You call me. [Hearing]
I'll call you. You call me. [Deaf]
I live in a big apartment, in a nice neighborhood.
Jonas prefers to study math by himself.
My first class is English and for third I have a lunch break.
The two of us are freshmen, they are seniors.
We finished our homework during lunch.
Are you coming to school next week?
Do you need a doctor right now?
Can you study for sign language Wednesday?
How many hours did you study yesterday?
You need to go to the hospital if you are really sick.
My birthday was two weeks ago.
My girlfriend and I just celebrated our three-month anniversary.
Sometimes Easter is in March, other times it's in April.
Thanksgiving is the fourth Thursday of November.
They all need to wash their hands.
This morning, we were late for breakfast.
What did you do this weekend?
Ask Sloan to pass the fork and knife.
Carlos eats a banana and apple in his cereal.
Chick-fil-A® is our favorite fast food.
I am thirsty. I need a cup of water.
I don't like ham; it is gross.
I was wrong; the cost is 5 dollars.
Jay owes Tracy money for the house.
She drinks strong coffee at breakfast.
The drive-thru has cheap french fries.
They like to order steak but not hamburgers.
We were 15 years old the first time we ate Chipotle®.
We would like two small and one large pizzas.
What kind of pizza do you like?
I don't know why some people drink soda? I prefer milk.
Zander is hungry. He wants to eat a banana.
Andres and Nick were hot so they went swimming.
Did you see those three girls walking?
Disgusting! Sharks and snakes are in the water.
Do you know where the band is playing tomorrow night?
Brett and Luke walked along the river.
My cat is white and my two dogs are black.
Our boat sailed three days in the Atlantic Ocean.
Our class will walk the Rocky Mountain next week.
She enjoys swimming in the summer.
She is sitting under the tree looking around the landscape and watching the sunset.
There are farms all over my town and it has one grocery store.
Would you prefer to visit a zoo or the farm?
Did the three of you finish watching the movie and the play last week?
It looks like it's going to rain.
That boy over there, he has brown hair and a black backpack.
That girl over there at the locker.
Those two girls, they are walking.
I am calling VRS, but we are on hold?
I already have an alarm set up in my room.
Are you finished? Let's go! (hurry up)
Rachel enjoyed our outing to the art museum.
My favorite deaf actor is Nyle DiMarco.
I'm not sure what you have on, but it's not right.
Your skirt looks really cute. I want one.
Is the silent dinner this Thursday?
We saw a movie and ate popcorn last Friday.
Put on your hat; it is cold outside.
What are you wearing? I don't like it. Your shirt looks like an old woman.
Andres wants to be a police officer.
Whoa! Did you hear FSDB beat MSSD?
The Deaf Club Bowling team are the champions!
Hey, throw me the football and let's play.
We all cheered the basketball team.
I don't play soccer, I am no good.
My coach is studying to be a lawyer.
The pond is on the left.
Did Todd say Washington, D.C., is the capital of America?
How many states have you been to?
Last year we flew to Mexico.
Don't forget your makeup and blow dryer.
Hey, do you mind asking if the hotel provides breakfast?
Hey, hurry up! Are you ready to go? This backpack is heavy! Let's get out of here!
Why did we decide to change hotels two weeks ago?
Victor and Michael are planning a fancy vacation.
Tell me, do you think Texas is as hot as Florida?
We will visit Europe next year.
The four of us will take a train into the city.
The mechanic is fixing my dad's boat.
We landed and looked around; it was fascinating.
I hate the takeoff when flying.
We sat near the airplane engine; it was loud.
Last summer, four of my friends and I traveled the world. We really enjoyed it!
They will visit Northern Ireland for spring vacation.
If I visit Northern Ireland, will they be able to understand ASL?
When she traveled to Europe, she used her phone to translate.
Is there an International sign language?
I am so frustrated. My laptop at work crashed and they said they would fix it, but have not.
When you arrive enter through doors and immediately go right. Head straight down the hall following signs that say 'downtown.'
Carlos? Go through the entrance, to the right under the elevator sign.
Come on, we can sit in the three chairs downstairs just behind the wall.
Walk downstairs and the white table and chairs are to the right, in front of the window.
Why do I need to go? My game is over.
Gate 10 is to the left past the bathroom.
I will drive to the beach.
Is your HS school big, which?
Where do you prefer to sleep?
What do you like for breakfast?
Sandra and Allen went to the grocery store.
A day at the beach is for chilling out and relaxing in the sun.
My friends and I enjoy Halloween so we get together as a group.
See those two girls over there?
Hey, we need your phone number.
Where is the white circle table with 2 chairs?
Where do you 3 want to sit?
How do I get to the downtown train?
How do I get to the museum from home?
From the museum, how do I get to the parking garage?
